components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to TNM Network in Malawi

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to TNM Network in Malawi. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to TNM Network in Malawi. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to TNM Network in Malawi. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 15 business days approximately until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We will provide another update on 03/03/2023 at 10:45 am Pacific Time or as soon as more information becomes available.

Campaign reviews are expected to take over 15 business days approximately until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We will provide another update every 7 days. Next update will be provided on 02/24/2023 at 10:45 am Pacific Time or as soon as more information becomes available.

We expect to provide another update in next 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with A2P 10DLC campaign reviews, facing delays due to high volume. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have additional information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Service Partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 2 March 2023 at 23:00 PST until 3 March 2023 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada
Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: The XL network in Indonesia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 05 March 2023 at 10:00 PST until 05 March 2023 at 11:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from XL Indonesia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: UK SMS Carrier Maintenance - 3 (Hutchison 3G UK Ltd)

incident_updates.body: The 3 (Hutchison 3G UK Ltd) network in UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 March 2023 at 16:30 PST until 05 March 2023 at 23:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from 3 (Hutchison 3G UK Ltd) handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance - Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a scheduled maintenance from 06 March 2023 at 12:00 PST until 06 March 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS from and to the following Etisalat networks in below countries:

Afghanistan
Egypt
Sri Lanka
Saudi Arabia
United Arab Emirates

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 6 March 2023 at 16:00 PST until 6 March 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to a subset of Twilio United Kingdom phone numbers.

Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and Austria is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 March 2023 at 16:00 PST until 06 March 2023 at 20:00 PST, During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Twilio Germany and Austria phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Voice and SMS carrier partner maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice and SMS carrier partner in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 March 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 07 March 2023 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call drops to and from UK handsets via a subset of local Long codes, and there could be intermittent SMS failures from UK handsets to a subset of local Long codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Provider Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Service Provider is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 March 2023 at 21:00 PST through to 19 March 2023 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada. Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Identity Match.

Note: The maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

07 March 2023 at 21:00 PST through to 08 March 2023 at 03:00 PST
11 March 2023 at 21:00 PST through to 12 March 2023 at 03:00 PST
14 March 2023 at 21:00 PST through to 15 March 2023 at 03:00 PST
18 March 2023 at 21:00 PST through to 19 March 2023 at 03:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: A Subset of Small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 March 2023 at 21:00 PST until 8 March 2023 at 03:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 8 March 2023 at 07:00 PST until 8 March 2023 at 07:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures to and from Japan phone numbers.

A Subset of Small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 March 2023 at 21:00 PST until 09 March 2023 at 02:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: The Vodafone network in Egypt is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 March 2023 at 15:00 PST until 09 March 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Vodafone Egypt handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance - Small US Regional Carriers

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 March 2023 at 21:00 PST until 10 March 2022 at 01:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from below carriers via a subset of US Shortcode and US Longcode.

Bluegrass Cellular
Bravado Wireless (Cross Wireless)
Carolina West Wireless
CellCom (New Cell)
Cellular One (MTPCS)
Chat Mobility
Copper Valley
Cordova Wireless
GCI Communications (Alaska DigiTel & ACS Wireless)
Illinois Valley Cellular
Inland Cellular
Mid-Rivers Cellular (Cable & Cellular Communications)
NewCore (ASTAC / PTCI / Standing Rock)
Nex-Tech Wireless
NorthwestCell (Northwest Missouri Cellular)
Pine Belt Cellular
Rural Independent Network Alliance (RINA)
Southern LINC
Thumb Cellular
Union Cellular
Viaero Wireless
West Central Cellular

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Carrier Partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 March 2023 at 11:00 PST until 13 March 2023 at 16:59 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for UK.
Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap and Identity Match

The Lifecell network in Ukraine is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 March 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 15 March 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Lifecell Ukraine handsets.

The Vodafone network in Egypt is conducting an emergency maintenance from 16 March 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 16 March 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Vodafone Egypt handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 March 2023 at 12:00 PST until 29 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

02 March 2023 at 12:00 PST until 02 March 2023 at 16:00 PST
06 March 2023 at 12:00 PST until 06 March 2023 at 16:00 PST
